name: Wanderer [webgl]
description:
For those without androids, or who want to try the game before downloading it. View the full project page here. The webpage will freeze for a second while first loading the game and map screen, this is normal and unavoidable due to how webgl works.

Use your mouse to click and drag, WASD to move within the map. The map won't be of your location (for obvious reasons) and will have a limited range. iOS is in the works but has no ETA as of yet.
